display_name: Sleep Efficiency: the proportion of estimated sleep duration in in-bed period from type III home sleep test
description: Estimated sleep duration, providing an approximation of total sleep duration (i.e. total sleep time) inferred from analysis of non-EEG channels [Zhao et al., 2017 (PMID:27707441)]( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5181603/) In-bed period is the interval between lights off/in-bed time and lights on/out-bed time. Conventionally, this variable could be described as the ratio between total sleep time (TST) and time in bed (TIB).
